TopicTitle: Just some concepts that I've had.

Articles.Content:
These are just some concepts I've come up with/modeled in Google SketchUp (as its the only program I'm competent in), I would make them a reality but I know very little C/Blender/etc.

Now as to keep the post compact I will display all, and add new images to this album, I will also add updates when I add new models/screenshots.

Also here is the models that I've uploaded to Sketchfab.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

EDIT: Added new inflatable centrifuge.

EDIT: added new modular payload bay with telescope module

Edited December 6, 2013 by TheSuperintendnt
These are pretty awesome! The station ones especially would be awesome in a parts pack.
I remember you posting the designs for one of your centrifuges on my Outreach thread. While I liked that original one, those medium centrifuges (v1) look very nice!

Indeed, I remembered that I had posted it somewhere, and the mediums are indeed my favorites.

Edited November 10, 2013 by TheSuperintendnt
Hmm, I like that rover cab! Hope to see continued development of that.

I would love to bring just one of these into reality but I'm not sure were to starts, I have looked at some tutorials but I'm still not sure how to get the models from SketchUp to KSP, any suggestions, tips, links?

it requires downloading unity and the KSP part tools in order to get them into KSP (for the part tools the fixed link is near the bottom of page 7)

all it takes is downloading both and importing he part tools into unity (also it is free)
